result.eng: Say it again please.
result.ga: Abair arís é le do thoil
result.orig: Abair arís é le do thoil
result.html: Abair arís é le do thoilSay it again please.
result.ponchtml: Abair arís é le do ṫoilSay it again please.

result.eng: Are you drunk again?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ar meisce arís
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ar meisce arís
result.html: An bhfuil tú ar meisce arísAre you drunk again?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ar meisce arísAre you drunk again?

result.eng: The contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ga: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.orig: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.html: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart aṁarc go géar ar an ċonraḋ arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.

result.eng: Your father will be in good health again before long.
result.ga: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfadYour father will be in good health again before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ d'aṫair ina ẛláinte arís sul i ḃfadYour father will be in good health again before long.

result.eng: I'll be talking to you again.
result.ga: Beidh mé ag caint leat arís
result.orig: Beidh mé ag caint leat arís
result.html: Beidh mé ag caint leat arísI'll be talking to you again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag caint leat arísI'll be talking to you again.

result.eng: We will have to examine the case again.
result.ga: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.orig: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.html: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arísWe will have to examine the case again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn breaṫnú ar an ċás arísWe will have to examine the case again.

result.eng: You will have to talk to her again.
result.ga: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.orig: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.html: Beidh ort labhairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort laḃairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.

result.eng: The boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ga: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.orig: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.html: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an bád ag druidim isteaċ sa ċé agus sul i ḃfad ḃí siad ar ṫalaṁ tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.

result.eng: What is your name again, please?
result.ga: Cad is ainm duit arís le do thoil
result.orig: Cad is ainm duit arís le do thoil
result.html: Cad is ainm duit arís le do thoilWhat is your name again, please?
result.ponchtml: Cad is ainm duit arís le do ṫoilWhat is your name again, please?

result.eng: They asked me the same question again and again.
result.ga: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.orig: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.html: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad an ċeist ċéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.

result.eng: If you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.
result.ga: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís
result.orig: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís
result.html: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arísIf you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.
result.ponchtml: Má ṁaiṫeann tú dom é ní raċaiḋ mé ṫar do ċoṁairle go deo arísIf you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.

result.eng: It was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ga: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.orig: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.html: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Noċtaḋ i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ um ṫráṫnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.

result.eng: It won't happen again.
result.ga: Ní tharlóidh sé arís
result.orig: Ní tharlóidh sé arís
result.html: Ní tharlóidh sé arísIt won't happen again.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫarlóiḋ sé arísIt won't happen again.

result.eng: The buses are running late again.
result.ga: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.orig: Tá moill ar na busanna arís
result.html: Tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.
result.ponchtml: Tá moill ar na busanna arísThe buses are running late again.

result.eng: It is nice to hear from you again.
result.ga: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arís
result.orig: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arís
result.html: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arísIt is nice to hear from you again.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arísIt is nice to hear from you again.

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.

result.eng: I go to Brussels now and again.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an Bhruiséil anois is arís
result.orig: Téim go dtí an Bhruiséil anois is arís
result.html: Téim go dtí an Bhruiséil anois is arísI go to Brussels now and again.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an Ḃruiséil anois is arísI go to Brussels now and again.

result.eng: Excuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do ṫoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?

result.eng: Call back again, please.
result.ga: Glaoigh ar ais aríst le do thoil
result.orig: Glaoigh ar ais aríst le do thoil
result.html: Glaoigh ar ais aríst le do thoilCall back again, please.
result.ponchtml: Glaoiġ ar ais aríst le do ṫoilCall back again, please.

result.eng: You will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ga: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.orig: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.html: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidhYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú sásta a ḃeiṫ sa mbaile aríst naċ mbeiḋYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?

result.eng: What is your name again?
result.ga: Céard is ainm duit arís
result.orig: Céard is ainm duit arís
result.html: Céard is ainm duit arísWhat is your name again?
result.ponchtml: Céard is ainm duit arísWhat is your name again?

result.eng: It's nice to see you again!
result.ga: Tá sé go deas tú a fheiceáil arís
result.orig: Tá sé go deas tú a fheiceáil arís
result.html: Tá sé go deas tú a fheiceáil arísIt's nice to see you again!
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go deas tú a ḟeiceáil arísIt's nice to see you again!

result.eng: Goodbye, Séamas, and thanks again.
result.ga: Slán agat a Shéamais agus go raibh maith agat arís
result.orig: Slán agat a Shéamais agus go raibh maith agat arís
result.html: Slán agat a Shéamais agus go raibh maith agat arísGoodbye, Séamas, and thanks again.
result.ponchtml: Slán agat a Ṡéamais agus go raiḃ maiṫ agat arísGoodbye, Séamas, and thanks again.

result.eng: I listen to the radio now and again.
result.ga: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arís
result.orig: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arís
result.html: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arísI listen to the radio now and again.
result.ponchtml: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arísI listen to the radio now and again.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.html: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: The next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ga: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.orig: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.html: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ponchtml: Lá arna ṁáraċ ḃí Séimí arís ina ċruṫ féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
